column1: | mason funeral home| mrs. mary walker maxwell
column8: at her residence. mrs. maxwell was born june 22
column12: daughter of the late james earl and tansy edwards walker. she was a member of the heritage netherlands reformed church
column14: she was employed with southern airways. in addition to her parents
column15: she was preceded in death by her husband
column17: michael ""sean"" maxwell. mrs. maxwell is survived by her daughter and son-in-law
column18: alissa maxwell porter and buddy porter
column21: and a great-niece. mrs. maxwell will be in state at mason funeral home and the family will receive friends from 11:00 a. m. until 1:00 p. m. wednesday
column23: 2015. private interment in greenhills memory gardens to follow.
